item.description:
Manifesting the Law of Attraction in

Action

NEW… FANTASTIC…POSITIVE…INVITING….LOCATION

 

East Side Chamber of Commerce

16 Cutler Street #102

Warren, RI

401.245.0750

7pm-9pm $12 Please RSVP

 

Come network with other like-minded positive, encouraging people!!!

 

“Stinking Thinking” keeps us stuck…

 

We get what we get by what we are thinking about…through …

 

The Universal Law of Attraction

 

Negative Self Talk is very counter-productive to attracting your desires…

 

We will be talking about why this is…and why in 17 seconds of a thought we start attracting and …

 

How to heal a toxic, negative, counter-productive thought…

 

And



How to protect yourself from others “stinking thinking”, negative thoughts and being dragged down…

 

And

 

Why it’s so important to Build your dreams from the TOP Down…First, Getting your mind straight about it!

 

 

We will be going over step by step plan where you can see how you can…

Manifest the Law of Attraction in Action in your life!

 

This will be an exciting fun class with experience and valuable info all woven together…

Nicole Marie LeBlanc, ATP has been leading Law of Attraction groups for four years now, with almost 400 people in her combined groups in a few states… Nicole has been using Law of Attraction on a regular and daily basis for many years…it wasn’t until the ending of a corporate medical sales job that she really started applying the law of attraction, rebuilding her life and the career of her dreams involving…

Angel Therapy, Crystal & Reiki Energy Healing, Indigo Spiritual Healings, Sacred Heart Yoga, & Gemstone Therapy…and of course…Law of Attraction

Nicole has many manifesting stories that will encourage and inspire!

group.name: South Shore Law of Attraction Manifestors

item.name: Manifesting the Law of Attraction in Action
